intro: Guettarda lucida, commonly known as the shining guettarda, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes a wide variety of ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its evergreen leaves, which are glossy and elliptical in shape. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Guettarda lucida is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
